review: First off, the FS makes accessing Netflix and Prime much easier on my ' dumb'  TV than hooking up my laptop to the TV and finding somewhere I can sit it without obscuring the TV screen as I watch.  The streaming is almost flawless, unlike my laptop/TV set up.  At $39, it sure beats buying a new TV!The negatives--  with arthritis, it was almost impossible to open the remote.  After a search, I found several YouTube videos that helped, but I still had to wedge a narrow blade in to get the process started.  The other problem was unlocking my wireless.  I do not know about anyone else, but I have a passkey for the router, a password for my account, another password for Internet access on my computer...  It took me time and patiende to find the right one.  If you enter the wrong one, the screen tells you that and tells you to try again, which did not work.  What did work was turning the TV entirely off, then on again to try the next password/passkey.Definiteley worth the effort, as long as you are stubborn, like me.
